name: DODGEBALL 2D
description:
Fast and simple dodgeball game with 2d and 2 players.

Controls:

Player 1;

Move: A S D

Jump : Space

Ball Angle: W A S D

Throw Ball: J

Green Bar Abilities: J

Red Bar Abilities: l

Dash:K

Shift: Stays still when using the Green Bar Abilities feature

Player 2;

Move: Arrow keys

Jump : 0

Ball Angle: Arrow keys

Throw Ball: 4

Green Bar Abilities: 4

Red Bar Abilities: 6

Dash:5

Enter: Stays still when using the Green Bar Abilities feature

F11: Fullscreen

F9:MiniScreen

Esc:Quit
